headline: Nippon Life to Acquire Resolution Life for $8.2 Billion
summary: By Kosaku Narioka Nippon Life Insurance has agreed to acquire Bermuda-based Resolution Life Group Holdings for about $8.2 billion, marking its latest multibillion deal as it seeks growth abroad...

headline: Blackstone sees private equity North America exit volumes doubling next year
summary: Alternative asset manager Blackstone expects exit volumes in its North America private equity business to double in 2025, driven by expectations of increased IPOs, and M&As activity, as inflation...

headline: Blackstone Credit & Insurance Announces Over $1 Billion in New Financings to Support Recapitalization of Jet Support Services, Inc., a Portfolio Company of GTCR and Genstar Capital
summary: NEW YORK, December 10, 2024--Blackstone Credit & Insurance ("Blackstone") and Jet Support Services, Inc. ("JSSI") today announced over $1 billion in new financings to support the recapitalization of JSSI, the world’s largest independent provider of hourly cost maintenance programs for business aircraft engines, auxiliary power units, and airframes. Funds managed by Blackstone have now provided over $1.8 billion of debt financing and an investment in the common equity in a series of financings fo

headline: Nippon Life to buy Resolution Life for $8.2 billion, Nikkei says
summary: Nippon Life Insurance will buy U.S. life insurer Resolution Life Group Holdings for about $8.2 billion in what would be the biggest acquisition ever by a Japanese insurer, Nikkei reported on Tuesday....
